name: Hologram Projector
description: Equipped with homing system, the missiles deal damage from all directions so your enemies have nowhere to run. Fight with your best partner by your side!
source: Summon a missile launcher for **8** seconds. **90**-second cooldown. Fire multiple missiles to attack nearby enemies, each dealing damage equal to **30%** of ATK.

advancement.description: Increase damage dealt by holograms to **75%** of the Wanderer's damage.
Tap again to transpose to the hologram's position.
Increase volt damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Increase damage dealt by holograms to **100%** of the Wanderer's damage. Transposing removes control effects.
